title: A Bad Moms Christmas
cast: Mila Kunis, Kristen Bell, Kathryn Hahn
description: A Bad Moms Christmas (also known as Bad Moms 2) is an upcoming American Christmas comedy film directed and written by Jon Lucas and Scott Moore. It is a sequel of the 2016 film Bad Moms. Amy, Carla, and Kiki struggle to cope when their respective mothers visit for the holidays.
